epocakir 0.5.0
  • Reference

GFR Estimation

Source: R/ckd.R
eGFR.Rd

  • 2009 CKD-EPI creatinine equation

  • 2012 CKD-EPI cystatin C equation

  • 2012 CKD-EPI creatinine-cystatin C equation

  • Pediatric equations

eGFR(
  SCr = NULL,
  SCysC = NULL,
  Age = NULL,
  height = NULL,
  BUN = NULL,
  male = FALSE,
  black = FALSE,
  pediatric = FALSE
)

eGFR.adult.SCr(SCr, Age, male, black)

eGFR.adult.SCysC(SCysC, Age, male)

eGFR.adult.SCr_SCysC(SCr, SCysC, Age, male, black)

eGFR.child.SCr(SCr, height)

eGFR.child.SCr_BUN(SCr, height, BUN)

eGFR.child.SCysC(SCysC)

Arguments

SCr

(units) Serum creatinine, converted to mg/dl
SCysC

(units) Serum cystatin C, converted to mg/l
Age

(units) Age of patient, converted to years
height

(units) Height of patient, converted to m
BUN

(units) Blood urea nitrogen, converted to mg/dl
male

(logical) Male or not
black

(logical) Black race or not
pediatric

(logical) Paediatric or not

Value

(units) Estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR) in ml/min/1.73m2

Examples

print("todo")

#> [1] "todo"
